mapper.sql: id, test_group_id, student_id, score, create_date, update_date, del_flag, is_new_record, create_by, update_by, answer_picture, correct_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from correct_info
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update correct_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
test_group_id = #{record.testGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
student_id = #{record.studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{record.score,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
is_new_record = #{record.isNewRecord,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{record.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{record.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer_picture = #{record.answerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
correct_flag = #{record.correctFlag,jdbcType=BIT},

update correct_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, test_group_id = #{record.testGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_id = #{record.studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, is_new_record = #{record.isNewRecord,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{record.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{record.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer_picture = #{record.answerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correct_flag = #{record.correctFlag,jdbcType=BIT}

update correct_info
test_group_id = #{testGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
is_new_record = #{isNewRecord,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer_picture = #{answerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
correct_flag = #{correctFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update correct_info set test_group_id = #{testGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, is_new_record = #{isNewRecord,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer_picture = #{answerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correct_flag = #{correctFlag,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT test_info.test_name ,test_group.id AS 'testGroupId' ,correct_info.create_date AS 'submitTime',user_info.name AS 'stuName', correct_info.student_id AS 'stuId' FROM test_group JOIN test_info JOIN correct_info JOIN user_info WHERE test_group.test_id=test_info.id AND test_group.id=correct_info.test_group_id AND correct_info.correct_flag=0 AND user_info.id=correct_info.student_id AND test_info.create_by=#{teacherId} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
